release.action: Added Sonatype repository to pom.xml for snapshot releases.
Updated several maven plugins and added SonarQube maven plugin.

Library updates: Norconex Commons Wicket 1.0.1, SLF4J 1.7.12, Norconex JEF 4.0.3, Jetty 9.2.10.v20150310, Apache Wicket 6.19.0, JUnit 4.12, Apache Commons Logging 1.1.3, Apache Commons BeanUtils 1.9.2, Apache Commons Configuration 1.10, Joda-Time 2.7, Apache HttpComponents Client 4.4.1.
Now released as Open-Source under The Apache License 2.0.
Added capability to have one JEF Monitor instance monitor several others.
Can return progress as XML with URL .../api.
Can now update application settings via a new Settings button.
Each instance of JEF Monitor is now given a name to better differentiate them.
Job tree more responsive, with better tooltips.
